title: Amazon adds ‘Play on Luna’ button to Twitch, something Google wanted to do with Stadia
content:
Google’s efforts in the cloud gaming space with Stadia started off with shooting for the stars, but quickly turned to the company shooting itself in the foot with missed expectations. The ideas Stadia had, though, remain pretty great, and now Amazon Luna is adopting one of them with a “Play on Luna” button appearing on Twitch.

more…

The post Amazon adds ‘Play on Luna’ button to Twitch, something Google wanted to do with Stadia appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Amazon Luna has added support for click-to-play functionality between the cloud gaming service and Twitch, speeding up access to games.
